author: timbeiko
content:
Heads up, we'll have a breakout next Wed 15 UTC to discuss the various SSZ transaction types proposals: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/721 

It would be great if teams that have a strong opinion about this can send a representative. We'll recap the outcome on ACDE the day after as well.
